projects.name: SendDB
projects.description: A Discord bot that allows you to track Geometry Dash level sends. Comes with many leaderboards and features like DM notifications.

projects.name: Geode Mods
projects.description: A collection of mods for Geometry Dash. Mainly QoL and utility mods.

projects.name: GDSW-API
projects.description: A simple API for the GD Secret Way Mod. Written in Python using FastAPI.

projects.name: Personal Site
projects.description: My new website, written in NextJS. This was my first web framework project.

projects.name: Pikopian Empire Bot
projects.description: Private Discord bot to link a Hypxixel guild to a Discord server. Includes many features such as guild stats, automatic Bedwars stats updates and more.

projects.name: Oasis Events
projects.description: A Minecraft event server with custom plugins and events. Co-owned with a friend.

projects.name: Skript Plugins
projects.description: Minecraft server plugins, created on request. Past work: Mythic SMP Plugin, Oasis Events Plugin, Hunters SMP Plugin.

projects.name: Ballsdex Utils
projects.description: A Discord bot created to improve the Ballsdex experience. Includes many QOL features.

projects.name: BetterBlooket
projects.description: Blooket client with extra features and plugin support. Abanonded due to cease and desist.

projects.name: Pirate Pufferfish
projects.description: A Discord bot that allows you to manage your Blooket account through Discord.

projects.name: Blooket-Cheats
projects.description: Blooket cheats repository. Has been taken down many times due to cease and desist.

projects.name: goldenCookieSettings
projects.description: Cookie Clicker add-on, adding settings to control how golden cookies behave.

projects.name: ServerManager
projects.description: My first Discord bot, used to manage your Discord server. This was my first Discord.py project.

projects.name: Personal Site
